titles.title: To amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to make improvements to the food safety education program carried out under such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Rural Development, and Credit.

bill.summary:
11/14/2013--Introduced. Amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to authorize appropriations for the food safety education program.
Includes in such program education: (1) about practices that prevent bacterial contamination of food, how to identify sources of food contamination, and other means of decreasing food contamination; and (2) aimed at farm workers.
